name: The Storied Path
description:
The Storied Path is a short narrative experience about the self. It was created across 2 days for the Las Vegas Summer Game Jam 2018.

This game was built in Unreal Engine 4, and used SculptrVR to construct the environment.

All assets and code - https://twitter.com/SculptrVR

Writing - https://twitter.com/cyberbeedotexe
